misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm.
misuses.description: The use of the 'AES' algorithm is vulnerable to attacks such as the Bleichenbacher attack, which can allow an attacker to recover the plaintext of encrypted data.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and up-to-date cryptographic algorithm, such as AES-GCM or AES-CCM.
